title: Climate Change Activists Come Up Short In Midterm Elections
teaser: Tom Steyer, the hedge-fund billionaire, spent tens of millions of dollars in the midterms, mostly in seven senate and gubernatorial races. Most of his candidates lost, as will â€” presumably --one of his Steyer's key ambitions: major action on climate change.
